ComposerCraft

Not familiar with the great classical composers of history? Try my magic machine that recommends them based on your taste. It also gives you some info about them as well as a piece of recommended listening!


GoogleDocs clone

So accurate that upon loading, your browser will produce a warning that this site is designed to fool you into thinking it's the real deal. Complete with pseudo-classes and arranged using only vanilla CSS.


Finance App

Empower your financial journey with precision and simplicity. Your personal companion for instilling mindful budgeting and effortless expense tracking. Elevate your financial well-being, one transaction at a time.


ARHistory

An augmented-reality digital content provider. I built this website and designed, constructed and deployed user-interface work for their interactive web app project with National Museums Liverpool.
